title: Open a metric visualization in Explore

blocks.content: Explore is your starting point for querying and analyzing data in Grafana. It lets you run queries, visualize results, and build understanding of your data before creating dashboards.
To open a metric visualization in Explore:
Hover your cursor over the metric you want to open in Explore.
Click **Explore** to open the metric in Explore view.
When the metrics visualization opens, you'll see the query view. If needed, you can edit the query.
